title: Bug 11314: Replace package name fragments should always be smaller
OB: In the 'Replace package name fragments with:' field in the preferences (Java Work in progress), when 'com.ibm.foobar' is entered, it is replaced with 'co~.ib~.foobar'. The package name compression is replacing fragments even if the compressed name is not smaller in length.
EB: In the 'Replace package name fragments with:' field in the preferences (Java Work in progress), when 'com.ibm.foobar' is entered, it should not be replaced with 'co~.ib~.foobar'. The package name compression should only replace a fragment if the compressed name is actually smaller.
